name: granola
content:
granola noun
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a food made of baked grains, nuts, and dried fruit, usually eaten in the morning: She had a bowl of granola with yogurt for breakfast. Granolas can be an ideal breakfast cereal.

granola noun
(PERSON)
[ C ] US informal often disapproving someone who lives in a way that shows they care about the environment, and who who has generally liberal opinions (= accepting and encouraging social change): He thought being green meant being jeered as a granola and wearing unsightly sandals. "The granolas are having a fit," he wrote, apparently referring to environmentalists.
